title: Great I downloaded a patch and now I have malware on my computer
body:
Found it in my program files:

RiotSpyTool.ctbl

So it's not good enough that you ban us for downvoting Rioters, you lied about firing Lyte for more RP sales but you spy on us? You want to make sure I'm not playing other games. Because it's not a coincidence you've been spying on me and one of my favorite games, Land of the lost tamagotchi  was deleted and the company conveniently went out of business. 

I'm tired of Riot. Enjoy your report to the FCC and DEA. You did this to yourselves. You'll be speaking with Federal Agents soon enough.
